Metadata: Discarding practices and unobserved fishing mortality in marine fisheries: an update

This publication evaluates the more recent bycatch and discard literature (since 1992) and updates the 1994 "Global Assessments of fisheries Bycatch and Discards." It considers nomenclature, reviews and provides updates for national and international discard estimates, considers recent information concerned with unobserved fishing mortality, discusses the further evolution of bycatch policy and management, with special references to developments in the United States, and comments on bycatch documentation.
